attributes.action: increase penalties for using mobile phone while driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: increase the points from 3 to an immediate ban, and increase the fine to £5000.00.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/phonevanban/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
